languages.text: "Отсталые миры тоже вызывают у меня отвращение, но если долг зовет — надо идти".

traits.locale_text: "Отсталые миры тоже вызывают у меня отвращение, но если долг зовет — надо идти".

languages.text: "I too find underdeveloped worlds repulsive, but when duty calls, there is no choice but to go."
languages.original_text: "Отсталые миры тоже вызывают у меня отвращение, но если долг зовет — надо идти".

traits.locale_text: "I too find underdeveloped worlds repulsive, but when duty calls, there is no choice but to go."
"I too find underdeveloped worlds repulsive, but when duty calls, there is no choice but to go."
"I too find underdeveloped worlds repulsive, but when duty calls, there is no choice but to go."
"I too find underdeveloped worlds repulsive, but when duty calls, there is no choice but to go."
"I too find underdeveloped worlds repulsive, but when duty calls, there is no choice but to go."
"I too find underdeveloped worlds repulsive, but when duty calls, there is no choice but to go."

languages.text: 「俺も未開発の惑星には嫌悪感を抱くが、義務がある以上、行かねばならならない」
languages.original_text: "I too find underdeveloped worlds repulsive, but when duty calls, there is no choice but to go."

traits.locale_text: 「俺も未開発の惑星には嫌悪感を抱くが、義務がある以上、行かねばならならない」

languages.text: "Auch ich finde unterentwickelte Welten abstoßend, aber wenn die Pflicht ruft, geht man."
languages.original_text: "I too find underdeveloped worlds repulsive, but when duty calls, there is no choice but to go."

traits.locale_text: "Auch ich finde unterentwickelte Welten abstoßend, aber wenn die Pflicht ruft, geht man."

languages.text: « Les mondes sous-développés m'inspirent la même répugnance, mais quand le devoir nous appelle, il est impératif de lui répondre. »
languages.original_text: "I too find underdeveloped worlds repulsive, but when duty calls, there is no choice but to go."

traits.locale_text: « Les mondes sous-développés m'inspirent la même répugnance, mais quand le devoir nous appelle, il est impératif de lui répondre. »

languages.text: «Yo también encuentro repulsivos los planetas subdesarrollados, pero cuando el deber llama no queda otra opción que responder».
languages.original_text: "I too find underdeveloped worlds repulsive, but when duty calls, there is no choice but to go."

traits.locale_text: «Yo también encuentro repulsivos los planetas subdesarrollados, pero cuando el deber llama no queda otra opción que responder».

languages.text: “我也觉得落后的世界令人生厌，但需要履行职责时，我别无选择，只能前进。”
languages.original_text: "I too find underdeveloped worlds repulsive, but when duty calls, there is no choice but to go."

traits.locale_text: “我也觉得落后的世界令人生厌，但需要履行职责时，我别无选择，只能前进。”

languages.text: "Az gelişmiş dünyalardan ben de hazzetmiyorum ama emirlere karşı gelinmez."
languages.original_text: "I too find underdeveloped worlds repulsive, but when duty calls, there is no choice but to go."

traits.locale_text: "Az gelişmiş dünyalardan ben de hazzetmiyorum ama emirlere karşı gelinmez."

languages.original_text: "I too find underdeveloped worlds repulsive, but when duty calls, there is no choice but to go."
